com.espertech.esper.jdbc.server.remote

Interface JDBCEndpointConnectionFilter


  • public interface JDBCEndpointConnectionFilter
    Interface for filtering incoming connections based on connection information in the connection request.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean filter(ConnectionInformation connectionInformation)
      Returns true to accept a new connection or false to reject a new connection.

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        boolean filter(ConnectionInformation connectionInformation)
        Returns true to accept a new connection or false to reject a new connection.
        Parameters:
        connectionInformation - passes connection details such as user, password and IP address
        Returns:
        indicator whether the server should accept the connection
